title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately.
OB: Currently, when the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label remains the same.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label's height should be adjusted accordingly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a label. 
2. Modify the font size of the label. 
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change.
